description: Discover a new way to experience street racing and dive into the legacy of BMW with new customization options to make every ride your own!
title: SEASON 8 IS HERE

author: Ubisoft
description:
#TheCrewMotorfest Season 8 hits the road on November 5! 

Discover a new way to experience street racing and dive into the legacy of BMW with new customization options to make every ride your own.

Get ready for Season 8 with 21 new vehicles, numerous quality-of-life updates and new weekly themed events. Plus, you can now play on Steam Deck and invite your friends to play for free with the new Friend Pass!

The Crew Motorfest is available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Ubisoft Connect PC, Epic Games Store, Luna and is included in the Ubisoft+ subscription. Get the game now on: https://ubi.li/1DX4P

Transfer hundreds of cars from The Crew 2 to The Crew Motorfest for FREE with the Collection Import. More info here: https://ubi.li/rHcEZ

About The Crew Motorfest:
Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate open-world driving experience. Explore an ever-expanding playground set in the Hawaiian archipelago, with new gameplay, features, cars and locations added in every
